Summary: flashing yellow and blue lights, moved from left to right then stationary, called U.C. Police they gave me phone number to Mufon, I called and made report to Mufon
divs: Sighting DetailsMy son and I were looking out the second story bedroom window when we noticed slow moving bright light moving from left to right very slowly. When a plane appeared the object would go dark and disappear, then reappear after plane vanished. I grabbed my digital camera and stated taking pictures. When I took some pictures the object was there, but when I looked at the camera it was not there. This happened several times. I called Union City Police to report it. They gave me the phone number to Mufon. I called and made my report. The Mufon Representative seem to try to debunk what I saw. He said that I was seeing Venus or a plane. I told him that I was a former Navy veteran aircraft mechanic and I know the difference between a plane and venus. I got furstrated and said ok, without telling him that I had pictures.
Object Flight Path: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
trends: There have been 6 other sightings in Union City
There were no other sightings in Union City on or around March 2nd 2012
